entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this morning then to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Fog patches developing early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain or periods of rain late in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
